actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To provide that certain games of chance conducted by a nonprofit organization not be treated as an unrelated trade or business of such organization.

summary.text: Repeals the provision of the Tax Reform Act of 1986 that requires certain games of chance conducted by a nonprofit organization to be treated as an unrelated trade or business for tax purposes.

titles.title: To provide that certain games of chance conducted by a nonprofit organization not be treated as an unrelated trade or business of such organization.
